response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and desires, is priced at $950,000. I believe this figure reflects its true worth while offering you a competitive advantage compared to other potential investments or acquisitions.

Given its significance to you, I am confident that this investment could yield substantial benefits over time. However, I understand that decisions of this nature require careful consideration. If you have any questions or need further information about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am more than happy to provide you with all the details necessary to make an informed decision.

Should you decide to proceed with this offer, I assure you a smooth transaction and excellent customer service throughout the process. If you choose not to accept this offer, rest assured that the product will be available for purchase by another interested party, John, who has expressed his willingness to pay $1,500,000 for it.

I look forward to your response and the possibility of working together to achieve your goals.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
